tool_description: This API typically provides a wide range of news articles, videos, and images from reputable news outlets and publishers, covering a variety of topics such as business, technology, sports, politics, and entertainment. The API can be integrated into a variety of applications, including websites, mobile apps, and news aggregators from different countries
title: Global News

api_list.name: country
api_list.description: You are supposed to send country name to check daily news for that specific country.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://global-news.p.rapidapi.com/news?country=usa"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "global-news.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
